text: Merville Allen Oulton (July 22, 1888 – June 26, 1953) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative Party representing Westmorland County from 1925 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:20th- century Canadian physicians Category:Canadian surgeons Category:1888 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs Category:People from Westmorland County, New Brunswick Category:20th- century surgeons
title: Merville A. Oulton
